actions: Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported favorably.
Reported by Senator Leahy, Committee on the Judiciary, without printed report.
Placed on Senate Executive Calendar. Calendar No. 16.
By unanimous consent agreement, debate and vote Monday, March 4, 2013.
Confirmed by the Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91
name: Katherine Polk Failla
nominee: Katherine Polk Failla, of New York, to be United States District Judge for the Southern District of New York
position: United States District Judge for the Southern District of New York
